scripts.database:deploy: cdk deploy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=dev.stratospheric.todoapp.cdk.DatabaseApp" -c accountId=221875718260 -c region=eu-central-1 -c applicationName=todo-app-chapter-11  -c environmentName=chapter-11 --require-approval never
scripts.database:destroy: cdk destroy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=dev.stratospheric.todoapp.cdk.DatabaseApp" -c accountId=221875718260 -c region=eu-central-1 -c applicationName=todo-app-chapter-11  -c environmentName=chapter-11 --require-approval never
